sentences: Sharissa Dawes (born August 21, 1975) is an American singer.
4Kast released their 1998 debut album, Any Weather, which was promoted with the singles "Miss My Lovin'" and "I Tried".
Her debut solo album, No Half Steppin' (2002), peaked at number 44 on the Billboard 200 chart.
Sharissa was featured the soundtrack of the 2003 romantic comedy film, Love Actually.
Her second solo album, Every Beat of My Heart (2005), was only released in Japan.
